/usr/bin/c++    -fexceptions -g    CMakeFiles/Arrows.dir/home/sam/Documents/Arrows/src/Main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Arrows.dir/home/sam/Documents/Arrows/src/Game.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Arrows.dir/home/sam/Documents/Arrows/src/Sprite.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Arrows.dir/home/sam/Documents/Arrows/src/Errors.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Arrows.dir/home/sam/Documents/Arrows/src/GLSLProgram.cpp.o  -o Arrows -rdynamic -Wl,-Bstatic -lSDL2main -Wl,-Bdynamic -lSDL2 -lpthread -lGLEW -lGL -lGLU -lGLEW -lSDL2
